amendment.description: An amendment numbered 98 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit the use of funds for implementing or enforcing the SEC's 2022 Proxy Advisor Rule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A064) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A064) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A064) Agreed to by voice vote.
